summary: Migrants trying to enter the U.S. illegally along the southwest border risk injury or death by crossing in remote areas. Border Patrol's Missing Migrant Program is intended to identify and help missing or injured migrants. In our April 2022 report , we recommended improving the data that the program reports to Congress on migrant deaths. Border Patrol has taken some steps since then. For example...
title: Southwest Border: Border Patrol's Missing Migrant Program
